name: Nekuia
description: Explosive, challenging, exhilarating! Nekuia is a 2D platformer involving exploration, adventure, speedruns and reflexes. This innovative and intense gameplay rewards speed and jump skills.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Dual Core 6600 @ 2.4GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel 4400, GeForce GTX 280, AMD Radeon HD 7750 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 Processor: i5-2500k@3.3GHz, AMD FX 6300 3.5GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 750, AMD R7 370 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
